title: Compare artist repr. of individ. Ren to Romantic

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing and planning time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. 

Describe and analyze the differences in the ways in which artists and writers portrayed the individual during the Italian Renaissance and the Romantic era of the late eighteenth and early nineteenth centuries.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
